thread.title: FIRST ALERT WEATHER: Heavy rain moves in tonight
thread.title_full: FIRST ALERT WEATHER: Heavy rain moves in tonight

author: @wis10
title: FIRST ALERT WEATHER: Heavy rain moves in tonight
text: FIRST ALERT WEATHER: Heavy rain moves in tonight COLUMBIA, S.C. (WIS) – We want to First Alert you to heavy rain potential this evening and tonight! First Alert Headlines · 1-2″ of rain is possible tonight bringing a First Alert Weather Day for the heavy downpours. · Saturday morning has a few lingering showers with a 50% chance of rain. · Winds are picking up tonight and temps drop into the upper 30s with wind chills near 27-32. · Sunday will come along with widespread sunshine and a cool breeze. First Alert Summary Tonight we have a First Alert Weather Day for heavy rain in upwards of 1-2″. The heaviest rain happens late tonight around Midnight. Winds will gust from time to time near 25-35mph. Watch out for ponding on roadways and flooded streams! Saturday we see a 50% chance of showers in the morning and then gusty winds and less of a chance for the afternoon. Right now we have a 50% chance of rain for the morning and then it goes down as we head into the afternoon. Sunday morning our wind chills dip down into the upper 20s to low 30s as winds are up and lows are in the upper 30s. We have high pressure building into the region and that clears us up with sunny skies. Highs reach the mid 60s for the afternoon hours. Monday morning will be chilly as well with some mid to upper 30s possible. Highs reach the upper 60s with partly cloudy skies. Tuesday is warmer with mid 40s in the morning and high temps reach the low 70s. Our next good chance of rain comes in Wednesday with a cold front nearing. Lows are in the mid 50s and highs reach the low 70s. First Alert Forecast First Alert Weather Day for Tonight: Heavy rain is possible, breaking up late overnight. 100% Chance with lows in the mid to upper 50s. Saturday: Drier conditions into the day with some isolated showers here and there. Highs in the upper mid-60s. Sunday: Sunshine takes over with a cool breeze. Highs in the mid-60s. Monday: Partly cloudy with highs in the upper mid-60s. Tuesday: More clouds on the increase with highs nearing 70 degrees. Wednesday: Cloudy with a 60% chance of showers and rain highs are in the low 70s. Feel more informed, prepared, and connected with WIS.
